column2: Waisa Bhi Hota Hai Part II
column4:
['Laundiya ke pallu mein se', '
Gau ki bu aawe', '
Gobar ki nali mein ek', '
Chhota sa suwar bhage', '
Kya kare beibay lut gaye hum to', '
Haar gaye beibay thak gaye hum to', '
Hai nahi hum mein dam', 'Laundiya ka kangana hai jo', '
Dugdugi bazave', '
Bandariya ka nach nache', '
Aur bhukhe so jave', '
Kya kare beibay apni to lag gayi hai', '
Haar gayi darling sabki satak gayi', '
Hai nahi hum mein dam', 'Laundiya ki bindiya pe se', '
Pasina tapke re', '
Khushre jo kurshi pe hai', '
Bidak ke lapke re', '
Tabhi to haar gaye chaudhari', '
Pighal gaye hum sharam se', '
Chullu bhar paani mein hum to', '
Dub gaye kasam se', '
Hai nahi hum mein dam', 'Kya kare beibay lut gaye hum darling', '
Haar gaye beibay thak gaye hum to', '
Hai nahi hum mein dam', 'Laundiya ki payal hai jo', '
Bande ko bandhe', '
Jhakad ke jat pakde', '
Langde ho jave', '
Laundiya ke pallu mein se', '
Laundiya ke pallu mein se', '
Laundiya ka kangana hai jo', '
Laundiya ka kangana hai jo', '
Laundiya ki bindiya pe se', '
Laundiya ki bindiya pe se', '
Laundiya ki payal hai jo', '
Laundiya ki payal hai jo.']
